languages.text: {n}Массивный алтарь в ваших покоях кажется чем-то древним и инородным. Стоит вам приблизиться, как ваши уши наполняются едва разборчивыми шепотками.{/n}
{n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Массивный алтарь в ваших покоях кажется чем-то древним и инородным. Стоит вам приблизиться, как ваши уши наполняются едва разборчивыми шепотками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}
{n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}
{n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}
{n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}
{n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你房间里这座沉重的祭坛看起来非常古老，与周围的一切格格不入。当你靠近祭坛时，你听到身边围绕着微弱的低语声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你房间里这座沉重的祭坛看起来非常古老，与周围的一切格格不入。当你靠近祭坛时，你听到身边围绕着微弱的低语声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}重厚な祭壇は古めかしく、あなたの部屋には場違いなものであった。近寄ると微かな囁きがあなたを取り巻いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}重厚な祭壇は古めかしく、あなたの部屋には場違いなものであった。近寄ると微かな囁きがあなたを取り巻いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'autel imposant semble ancien et détonne dans vos appartements. De faibles murmures virevoltent autour de vous lorsque vous approchez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'autel imposant semble ancien et détonne dans vos appartements. De faibles murmures virevoltent autour de vous lorsque vous approchez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Este pesado altar parece antiguo y desentona con el resto de los elementos de tu cámara. Al acercarte, escuchas leves susurros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Este pesado altar parece antiguo y desentona con el resto de los elementos de tu cámara. Al acercarte, escuchas leves susurros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der schwere Altar sieht sehr alt aus und wirkt in deinem Quartier fehl am Platz. Leises Flüstern umgibt dich, als du dich näherst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der schwere Altar sieht sehr alt aus und wirkt in deinem Quartier fehl am Platz. Leises Flüstern umgibt dich, als du dich näherst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kadim bir görünüşe sahip olan ağır sunağın odandaki varlığı sırıtıyor. Yaklaştığında hafif fısıltılar, etrafını sarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heavy altar looks ancient and out of place in your chambers. Faint whispers surround you as you approach.{/n}
